title: UH Hilo International Film Festival celebrates Asian and Pacific nations (The University of Hawaii System) ...
text: ( Source : The University of Hawaii System ) In recognition of United Nations Day , the focus of this year's International Film Festival at the University of Hawai ªi at Hilo is on Asian and Pacific nations that may not be well known in the
